entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 2.

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
